title: Answer Store Hours Question
description: A customer uses the website's chatbot to ask for the store hours of a specific location.

tasks.description: The customer asks the chatbot: 'What are your hours for the downtown store?'
tasks.expected_outcome: The chatbot understands the user's intent.

tasks.description: The chatbot looks up the requested store in the store information database.
tasks.expected_outcome: The chatbot finds the correct store record.

tasks.description: The chatbot replies with the store's hours for the current week.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer receives an accurate and immediate answer to their question.
